title: The Fun of Cake Decorating a Cake for All Reasons
brief_description: Elaine McGregor the most celebrated name for cake decorating in English speaking countries, has demonstrated her unique powers of teaching around the world. From Australia to the United States, from Japan to the length and breadth of the UK, as well as her own Woodnutt’s School of Cake Decorating in Hove, Sussex. Elaine has imparted her great skills to thousands of enthusiastic students. Rated: G
